chat.greeting: What would you like to know, {name}?
chat.description_1: I can help you understand your medical documents.
chat.description_2: Ask me anything about your prescriptions, lab results, or health records.
chat.ai_setup_prompt: Set up a local AI model to search and understand your health records. Everything stays on your device.
chat.ai_disclaimer: Coheara uses AI and is not a medical professional. Always consult your doctor.
chat.stream_error_guidance: Check that Ollama is running, then try sending your message again.
chat.conversation_start_error: Could not start a session. Please try again.
chat.confidence_tooltip: This indicates how much of this answer is directly supported by your documents.
chat.history_empty_description: Start a conversation to see your chat history here.
chat.suggest_symptom_persists: Your {symptom} has been ongoing for {days} days
chat.default_ask_medications: What medications am I currently taking?
chat.default_ask_interactions: Are there any interactions between my medications?
chat.default_ask_doctor: What should I ask my doctor at my next visit?
chat.default_ask_diagnosis: Explain my diagnosis in simple terms
chat.default_ask_changes: What changed since my last appointment?
